entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:47 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -33.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
